TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MouseDevice extends System.Windows.Input.InputDevice
Public MustInherit Class MouseDevice Inherits InputDevice
public ref class MouseDevice abstract : System::Windows::Input::InputDevice

summary.span: 表示鼠标设备。

span.span: Represents a mouse device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。The supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 对于与鼠标相关的输入，请使用 类。For mouse related input, use the class. 类表示应用程序的鼠标，并提供反映鼠标状态的方法、属性和事件。The class represents the mouse to an application and provides methods, properties, and events that reflect the state of the mouse.

summary.span: 获取报告此设备的输入的 。

span.span: Gets the that is reporting input for this device.
The source of input for this device.

summary.span: 将鼠标输入捕获到指定元素。

span.span: Captures mouse input to the specified element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当某个元素捕获鼠标时，它将接收鼠标输入，无论光标是否在其边界内。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders. 如果 未指定，则默认值 为 。If a is not specified, the default is . 若要释放鼠标捕获，请调用 `null` 作为要捕获的元素传递。To release mouse capture, call passing `null` as the element to capture. 如果在 引发或事件时捕获鼠标 ，并且输入不会转到鼠标下的元素，则 首先引发。If the mouse is captured when a or event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, and are raised first. 这使得捕获的元素有机会在 路由和事件之前释放捕获 。This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the and events are routed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当某个元素捕获鼠标时，它将接收鼠标输入，无论光标是否在其边框内When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether the cursor is within its borders 如果 未指定，则默认值 为 。If a is not specified, the default is . 若要释放鼠标捕获，请调用 `null` 作为要捕获的元素传递。To release mouse capture, call passing `null` as the element to capture. 如果在 引发或事件时捕获鼠标 ，并且输入不会转到鼠标下的元素，则 首先引发。If the mouse is captured when a or event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, and are raised first. 这使得捕获的元素有机会在 路由和事件之前释放捕获 。This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the and events are routed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当某个元素捕获鼠标时，它将接收鼠标输入，无论光标是否在其边界内。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders. 若要释放鼠标捕获，请调用 `null` 作为要捕获的元素传递。To release mouse capture, call passing `null` as the element to capture. 如果在 引发或事件时捕获鼠标 ，并且输入不会转到鼠标下的元素，则 首先引发。If the mouse is captured when a or event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, and are raised first. 这使得捕获的元素有机会在 路由和事件之前释放捕获 。This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the and events are routed.

summary.span: 获取鼠标指针正好悬停的元素。

span.span: Gets the element that the mouse pointer is directly over.
The element the mouse pointer is over.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已将鼠标捕获到该元素，则会直接将鼠标置于元素上。The mouse is considered directly over an element if the mouse has been captured to that element. 控件可以包含多个元素。Controls can be composed of multiple elements. 报告复合控件中的鼠标指针位于的特定元素，而不是控件本身。 reports the specific element in the composite control the mouse pointer is over and not the control itself. 例如，根据指针的哪一部分 ， 属性可能会报告 属性或的 。For example, depending on which part of a the pointer is over, the property could report the of the property or the . 使用 和上的 属性 来确定鼠标是否位于元素上，该元素包括其可视子元素或控件复合元素。Use the property on and to determine whether the mouse is over an element, which includes its visual child elements or control compositing elements.

summary.span: 获取或设置整个应用程序的光标。

span.span: Gets or sets the cursor for the entire application.

value.span: 如果没有设置 ，则为重写光标或 。

span.span: The override cursor or if is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置为的将应用于整个应用程序。The that is set to will be applied to the whole application. 若要清除替代 ，请将设置 为 `null` 。To clear the override , set to `null`. 设置 为 将强制鼠标光标不显示，但仍会处理鼠标事件。Setting to will force the mouse cursor not to be displayed, but mouse events are still processed.

summary.span: 强制同步鼠标重新。

span.span: Forces the mouse to resynchronize.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 监视器布局发生更改并调用 。The monitors layout changes and calls . 在某些情况下，必须强制对鼠标输入系统进行更新以响应更改。There are cases in which the mouse input system must be forced to update for it to respond to changes. 例如，必须在计时器上重新同步鼠标。For example, you must resynchronize the mouse on a timer.
